summary: This module defines a generic dataset wrapper for NeMo multimodal models that abstracts the loading and iteration of WebDataset shards, handling local and S3 sources, distributed partitioning, size reporting, and deterministic shuffling. It also provides a utility for reproducible random ordering of samples.
